name: Caveman's daily routine
description:
Welcome to the pretty challenging survival game. You will have to fight with the nature and aliens in order to survive. You should look for some food and make a bonfire to get warm.

Actually it is the first version of the game. I hope you will enjoy playing it)

Please write your impressions in comments.

Good luck! :)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits for music:

*64 Sundays by Twin Musicom* (used in main menu)

* Edge summer forest Roond NL by klankbeeld*
